resources.string: TAMM Assistance Services\nFor VisItors Company\n(Your Personal Assistant)

Tamm Company is a Kuwaiti Services Company which communicate with its Customers all over the World, the Company established since 2017 which enables the customers to be locked in an enjoyable with Special Experience through our application, Call centre, Website, and the Social Media Channels.\n \n The company has been a leader in the concept of personal assistance required by the current and future lifestyle of individuals, companies or government entities in a luxurious manner. The company provides its members with all the distinguished services provided by the personal assistant. The application consists of a sophisticated telephone application that includes the following services (tourism and aviation sector - delivery and car rental sector - Catering services, cinema reservations, e-shopping, all other concierge services, providing services for people with special needs, in order to get the services they need at anytime, anywhere 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our Priority is our Customers and we are doing our best to have their Satisfactions Through over 100 well Trained Employees working in Shifts 7/24 to sell a wonderful experience full of happiness and beautiful memories. Our specialized Team Quest to get the best Prices, Services, Comfort and Satisfaction for our Customers all over the world and focus at the destinations in high demand and they always make sure to serve our Customers with Professional Serving and highest quality to stay Trust worthy. We are looking forward to being one of (Tamm) Family. Yours sincerely,
